rubber.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a substance used to make tyres, boots etc, which is made from the juice of a tropical tree or artificially
rubber.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a small piece of rubber or similar material used for removing pencil marks from paper
rubber.translation[0].definitions[2].def: an object used for cleaning marks from a blackboard
rubber.translation[0].definitions[4].def: a series of games of bridge or cricket
rubber.translation[0].definitions[5].def: the piece of white rubber where the pitcher (=person who throws the ball) stands in a baseball game
